TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CspKeyContainerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供密碼編譯金鑰組的其他相關資訊。

span.span: Provides additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個類別來取得金鑰組，例如金鑰容器名稱或索引鍵數目的其他資訊。Use this class to obtain additional information about a key pair, such as the key container name or the key number. 在其中所產生的隨機金鑰的情況下或，直到您呼叫的方法，會使用金鑰，將不會建立金鑰容器。In cases where a random key is generated by the or the , a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 某些屬性類別將會擲回如果尚未建立的金鑰容器。Some properties of the class will throw a if a key container has not been created. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，並擷取該容器的相關資訊。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CryptoKeySecurity As CryptoKeySecurity

summary.span: 取得 物件，表示容器的存取權限和稽核規則。

span.span: Gets a object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

value.span: 物件，表示容器的存取權限和稽核規則。

span.span: A object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以擷取管理的判別存取控制建立的物件清單 (DACL) 和系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 容器。Use the property to retrieve the object that manages the creation of discretionary access control lists (DACLS) and system access control lists (SACLS) for a container.

span.span: The key type is not supported.

exception.span: 找不到密碼編譯服務提供者。

span.span: The cryptographic service provider cannot be found.
-or-
The key container was not found.

permission.span: 變更和檢視的存取控制與此金鑰容器相關聯的清單。

span.span: for changing and viewing the access control list associated with this key container.
Demand value: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyNumber As KeyNumber
public: property System::Security::Cryptography::KeyNumber KeyNumber { System::Security::Cryptography::KeyNumber get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，該值描述非對稱金鑰建立為簽章金鑰或交換金鑰。

span.span: Gets a value that describes whether an asymmetric key was created as a signature key or an exchange key.

value.span: 其中一個 值，該值描述非對稱金鑰建立為簽章金鑰或交換金鑰。

span.span: One of the values that describes whether an asymmetric key was created as a signature key or an exchange key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性衍生自欄位物件，用來初始化物件。The value of the property is derived from the field of the object that was used to initialize the object. 交換金鑰是對稱的金鑰組，用來加密工作階段金鑰，使它們可以安全地儲存並與其他使用者交換。An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 值會指定交換金鑰。The value specifies an exchange key. 這個值會對應到`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`用在 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 簽章金鑰是用來驗證 （數位簽章） 的訊息或檔案的非對稱金鑰組。A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files. 值會指定簽章金鑰。The value specifies a signature key. 這個值會對應到`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中所使用的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，並擷取該容器的相關資訊。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderName As String
public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the provider name of a key.
The provider name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定建立此金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者。This property specifies the cryptographic service provider that created the key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，並擷取該容器的相關資訊。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderType As Integer
public: property int ProviderType { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the provider type of a key.
The provider type.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的值取決於用來建立金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者。Valid values are determined by the cryptographic service provider used to create the key. 密碼編譯服務提供者通常會組織成群組或系列，每個都有它自己的資料格式和處理序集。Cryptographic service providers are generally organized into groups or families, each of which has its own set of data formats and processes. 兩個系列，使用相同的演算法，例如 RC2 的區塊編碼器，通常會使用不同的填補配置、 不同的金鑰長度和不同的預設模式。Two families that use the same algorithm, such as the RC2 block cipher, often use different padding schemes, different key lengths, and different default modes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，並擷取該容器的相關資訊。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

public: property bool RandomlyGenerated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否由 Managed 密碼編譯類別隨機產生金鑰容器。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a key container was randomly generated by a managed cryptography class.

value.span: 如果隨機產生金鑰容器，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the key container was randomly generated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，當建立隨機產生的金鑰容器時，金鑰容器名為"CLR {`guid value`}。 」Usually, when a randomly generated key container is created, the key container is named "CLR{`guid value`}." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰容器，並擷取該容器的相關資訊。The following code example creates a key container and retrieves information about that container.
